## ChampionManager.fetch() method

Fetches a champion (from the cache, if already available), or from data dragon and community dragon.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(id: string, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<Champion>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The [ID](./shieldbow.champion.id.md) of the champion whose data needs to be fetched. |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetching options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Champion](./shieldbow.champion.md)<!-- -->&gt;
